issue.title: [R] Document developer workflow for building project, running unit tests in r/README.md
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3824](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3824). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not being a regular R developer, it's not clear to me how to build and run the test suite if I wanted to contribute to the project

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3824?focusedCommentId=16795421) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
